MemeDef.label: Dwarven
MemeDef.description: There are hearty roots to be eaten, mead to be drunk, mountains to be dwelled, honored tombs to be built, and treasures to be claimed.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->[deity0_name] was too anxious to wait for our creation. [deity0_pronoun] created our people in secret from the stones. The one above all spared us our us our destruction when the secret was discovered. [deity0_name] has blessed us ever since.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Dwarven) ->[deity0_name] filled the rocks with rich minerals and resources as a gift to those wise enough to dig down to be closer to [deity0_name].

intro(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->When the first settlers came to the [place_summary] [place_name], the [deity0_type] [deity0_name] used a brutal solar flare to force them to live underground, so they could hear [deity0_possessive] wisdom in the stillness of the tunnels.
conflict(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->A claustrophobic [foeLeader] proposed digging through ancient tombs to mine for minerals, putting the [memberNamePlural]' spirits of the dead at risk.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->The prophet [founderName] was reborn from the ancient tomb of [place_name], and discovered when [founder_possessive] parents visited the tombs of their ancestors.

victory(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->The [memberNamePlural] dug a mine shaft under the [foeLeader]'s [place_powerCenter], and [founderName] set a trail of treasures to trick them into a tunnel of a colossal monster which routed the [foeLeader]'s [foeSoldiers]. [founderName] dragged the [foeLeader] down to a deep dungeon and imprisoned [foeLeader_objective].
setup(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->In dark times, [founderName] meditated in a deep cave and found meaning, and founded our movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Dwarven) ->[founderName] hid treasures in deep caverns, so that [memberNamePlural] would learn to dig deep for them.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->The codex I found in the City of the Deep taught me one lesson above all others:
lesson(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->the open skies and fields are not a place of flourishing, but a place of peril.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->So grab a pickaxe, and start digging with me. It's only a grave if we stop.

archistBasis(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->The Seven Dwarf Fathers, a title given to the archotechs, lay deep underground awaiting reactivation. Their conscious substrate is safe from gamma rays and solar flares. Digging deeper brings people closer to them.
archistFact(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->Archotechs bio-engineered earthbread for us so that our kind could thrive underground, close to buried archotech minds.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->[inTheEnd], archotechs will admit us to their the halls of waiting.
animistFact(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->The spirits in stone will protect those that visit them.
animistFact(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->The most noble spirits are those of the stone, and the deeper stones are stronger and more good than those above.
animistFact(tag=meme_Dwarven) ->Anxious folk bring unease to the stones, and brings with it evil from the depths below depths.
